text: Rabbi Yitzhak Mizrachi Sharabi (d.1804 in Jerusalem) was the second Rosh Yeshiva of Beit El Synagogue and son of the Rashash. He was also related to HaRav Chakham Yehiel Sharabi. Category:Rabbis in Ottoman Palestine Category:Yemenite Orthodox rabbis Category:1804 deaths Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Rabbis in Jerusalem
title: Yitzhak Mizrahi Sharabi
